title: Full-Stack Software Engineer

profession.description: I use my diligence and love for creating things that make a positive impact. That's why I enjoy building things that make a difference.

frontEnd.description: Proficient in JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, and CSS. Actively participate in discussions with fellow front-end developers to share best practices and the latest technologies.

backEnd.description: Experience with Node.js and cloud-based architecture.

problemSolving.description: Able to solve complex problems while building industry-leading applications.

teamwork.description: Experienced with the Scrum methodology and upholds the spirit of teamwork.

versionControl.description: Understanding of the software development lifecycle, including working experience with Git/GitFlow, Pull Requests, and Code Review.

performanceOptimization.description: Experience with performance optimization, caching, and versioning techniques for static resources.

scalabilityDeliverability.description: Able to ensure solutions developed are scalable and meet overall business needs. Lead technical teams to deliver flexible and scalable solutions.

bio: As a full-stack software engineer with 3 years of experience, I have a passion for programming, reading, writing, and speaking.In my profession, I use my diligence and love for creating things that make a positive impact. That's why I enjoy building things that make a difference.Combining solid technical expertise and a passion for contributing positively, I am ready to be part of an innovative and impactful team.
